title: No preview of ���
content:
Hi, creating my first font in FontLab 4.5 and working on a swedish keyboard. When I type ��� and the one printed on my keyboard they dont appear in the metric window (on top but not in the preview window), but others are. Please help me!

Screendump
Bild 3.pdf (25.1 k)
author: charlottehagg

comments.content:
Hej Charlotte,   
   
there's FontLab's own group, where you might get better answer to your question: [FontLab@groups.msn.com](mailto:FontLab@groups.msn.com)   
I'm using FL 4.6 on practically the same keyboardlayout (Finnish and Swedish are similar) and haven't faced this kind of trouble.   
   
Juhani
